channel.title: Software Engineering on Kevin Wang

item.title: Project Management as a Software Engineer
item.description:
DISC Project Management #

At the start of Winter Quarter, I was handed an unexpected bone. While I applied to Develop and Innovate for Social Change as a Software Engineer, the email was clear: I had two days to accept the role of Project Manager for a local non-profit - the Clark Street Beach Bird Sanctuary (CSBBS). Naturally, I accepted.

The Challenge #

I’ve been a project manager before, but only in small group settings with low stakes: group projects. This was entirely a new beast - talking to clients while simulatenously managing a team of backend and frontend software engineers, UI/UX designers.
